course_title: Infectious Disease Dynamics: Theory and Models
class_notes: Priority registration to 2nd year ID EPI certificate students.  All others may register Nov 1st.  Pre-requisite is knowledge of R via RSPH courses or independent learning prior to beginning of class is required.
course_description: This course will present the conceptual theory, mathematical framework, and computational tools to conduct mechanistic modeling of infectious diseases.
schedule_location: M 9am-11:50am in Grace Crum Rollins RAR
sections: Class Nbr: 3372, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9-11:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
